title: Can anyone provide PDF of M. Laxmikanth's Polity book? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes if you will search on google you might find one. Read that book multiple times. After every reading try some questions from a good question bank and test your depth. One good source is KSG 10000. It is available for free and contains topic wise static question. .READ MY ANSERS WITH CAREFULLY. HOPE IT'S HELPFUL TO YOU..
